title: Potential energy - change in radius of orbit

content.question:
A satellite is in a circular orbit around Earth. In Scenario <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, the radius of the satellite’s orbit is changed slightly such that the gravitational potential energy of the satellite-Earth system increases. In Scenario <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the radius of the satellite’s orbit is changed slightly such that the gravitational potential energy of the satellite-Earth system decreases. Which of the following correctly indicates how the radius of the satellite’s orbit changes in each scenario?
